# Chapter Role Map

## Chapter <N> — <Title>

### Purpose
Explain the primary goal of this chapter in one paragraph.

### Concepts Introduced
- Concept A
- Concept B

### Concepts Assumed (Previously Introduced)
- Concept X
- Concept Y

### Depth Level
- ☐ Conceptual
- ☐ Technical
- ☐ Applied
- ☐ Mixed

### Must NOT Do
- Introduce new notation
- Go into implementation details
- Repeat definitions from previous chapters

(Repeat for each chapter)
